narrative.narrative: Air KBZ is a domestic airline of Myanmar based at Yangon. It began operations on April 2,2011. It is owned by Kanbawza Bank, one of the five major private banks of Myanmar. Its other base is Mandalay and it serves about 16 domestic airports besides the two bases. At June 2014 it had six ATR 72-500's and two ATR 72-600's. There were two 600's on order also.
